name: Shkodra Elektronike
description: '''Shkodra Elektronike''' ({{IPA|sq|ˈʃkɔdɾa ɛlɛktɾɔˈnikɛ}}) is an Albanian-Italian [[folktronica]] duo formed in 2019 in [[Shkodër]] and consists of members '''Kolë Laca''' ({{IPA|sq|ˈkɔlə ˈlat͡sa}}) and '''Beatriçe Gjergji''' ({{IPA|sq|beaˈtɾit͡ʃɛ ˈɟɛɾɟi}}) . The singers both hold Albanian and Italian citizenships. They [[Albania in the Eurovision Song Contest 2025|represented Albania]] at the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2025|Eurovision Song Contest in 2025]] with the song "[[Zjerm (song)|Zjerm]]".
